sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import LayoutContext from '../context/layout/LayoutContext'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' const AddLayout = () => { const context = useContext(LayoutContext); const [layout, setLayout] = useState({fname:"", date:"", email:"", phone:""}) const {addLayouts } = context let navigate = useNavigate() const handleClic =(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); addLayouts(layout.fname,layout.date, layout.email, layout.phone); setLayout({fname: "", date:"", email: "", phone: ""}) navigate("/about"); } const onChange =(e)=>{ setLayout({...layout, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } return (
) } export default AddLayout
